Posts.Content: On Sep 20, 2012 2:01 AM nemoss wrote: Does anyone have joint pains post chemo and radiation therapy?  I was diagnosed in 2006.  I just completed hormone therapy with Fermara this past June.  Joints have been killing me over the last 4 weeks. Is anyone taking anything that helps other than pain killers. i know u will not think it will work but it does DEXAMETHSONE BUT take one in the morning and one at night only side effect is u stay up
Posts.Title: Joint Pain/breast Cancer Survivors
